text:
<% if [all[current]tag[Task]] %>
Goal {{!!goal}}
Resources {{!!resources}}
Status <> <$list filter="[all[current]taskstatus[Done]]"> on <$view field="completed" format="date" template="mmm 0DD YYYY"/> <$list filter="[all[current]!taskstatus[Done]]"> issues: <$view field="issues"/>

Results achieved so far:

    <$list filter="[all[current]backlinks[]tag[Result]]">
  • <$link/> --> <$view field="caption">
<% endif %>
title: $:/sf/Templates/Automatic/Task
creator: soren
description: Display a table of fields and other information about the task described by this tiddler.
